question: The "Camp Lemonnier" is located in which country?
explanation: Camp Lemonnier is located in Djibouti. Camp Lemonnier is controlled by the United States of America which designated the camp as the United States Naval Expeditionary Base which is in operation from 2001. It is located near to Djibouti-Ambouli International Airport in Djibouti City, the capital of Djibouti. It is also the seat of the Combined Joint Task Force-Horn of Africa of the U. S. Africa Command.
